poem.title: Less Sparta
poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text:
Poof! As the fluffy cats
Pounce. The mouse's
Guts are puce, as usual.
It's back to epigrams
In the pleasure garden.

But soft! The sour-puss populace,
Unwelcome to this cultural pitch and putt,
The poops and pukes of modernist allusion,
Relieves the Emperor's Warriors of their weaponry
And puts a real blade in the sash of the guillotine.
